response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and value, I understand it might seem expensive at first glance, but let me assure you, it's an investment that will pay off in the long run. Considering its worth to you and the benefits it can bring, I am offering this product to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its true value and your perceived worth, aiming to make it accessible while ensuring a reasonable return for us. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
